description: This file defines a React component called TripsPage, which manages and displays a list of trips, allowing users to create, edit, delete, and view trips. It interacts with external services for CRUD operations and utils for calculations.

methods.name: submitCreate
methods.description: Handles creation of new trip entries by collecting form data, processing participants and categories, calling createTrip, and resetting the form.

methods.name: startEdit
methods.description: Prepares the form for editing an existing trip by loading trip data into the form state and setting the editing ID.

methods.name: submitUpdate
methods.description: Handles updating an existing trip by collecting form data, calling updateTrip, and resetting the editing state.

methods.name: removeTrip
methods.description: Handles deletion of a trip, prompting for confirmation before calling deleteTrip and refreshing the trip list.
